The Thompson has been thoughtfully transformed into one of Koreatowns most sought after apartment communities! The completely remodeled residences feature a contemporary and elevated aesthetic, with finishes that include quartz countertops, Grohe fixtures, custom cabinetry, LG stainless steel appliances, in-home washer/dryer and wood-look flooring. The community also features a fitness center, lobby lounge and workspace area, and outdoor deck, complete with cabanas, barbecues and fire pits!

You'll be amazed to find so many great places right outside your door! Some of our favorite places include Chapman Plaza (Quarters BBQ, KazuNori, Sake House, Toe Bang, Escala, Tokki, Tiger Sugar Boba, Silverlake Ramen, BaekJeong BBQ, Starbucks), Blue Bottle and Sweetgreen a block North, The Line Hotel (Break Room 86, Openaire, Alfred Coffee, Kiss Kiss Bang Bang) a few blocks West, Open Market (artisan coffees, sandwiches and provisions) across the courtyard and Intercrew and Umaya LA across the street.

The communitys distinct character combined with its exceptional walkable location in the heart of Koreatown offers residents a highly covetable living experience, uniquely designed for the modern dweller. . Designed for Students Living: All our amenities, including central heating and air-conditioning, gated building, supersized rooms, and gated subterranean assigned parking will bring you peace of mind.
